name: Smack Back (lavaduder)
description:
A game where you smack a ball to four corners of the screen. Score points to stay alive. The closer you are to the center the higher your level will be. The farther you are from the triangle (While still being in it). The better score you will recieve. Black corner trys to fake you out.

Originally made for Weekly Game Jam 165

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-165

https://www.bitchute.com/video/w2SS6uZKu5q4/
